member.name: T:Prefill.PreFill
member.summary: Prefill, fills preceeding of value with desired character or string. E.g: PreFill(5) => 05 or 00000005 or " 5"

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetNumberOfDigit(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns number of digit of a specified number. (Signed byte, short, int, long)
member.param: l: A number whose number of digit to be found.
member.returns: Minimum 1 and maximum 20 on negative integer numbers, minimum 1 and maximum 19 on positive integer numbers.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetNumberOfDigit(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Returns number of digit of a specified number. (Unsigned sbyte, ushort, uint, ulong)
member.param: ul: A number whose number of digit to be found.
member.returns: Minimum 0 and maximum 19 on positive integer numbers.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetLengthOfString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns length of a specified text. (String)
member.param: A text whose length to be found.
member.returns: The number of characters of specified text.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.FillChar(System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns prefilling value for a specified text. (dynamically)
member.param: Number of filling.
Selected character to fill.
member.returns: A string whose filled specified char.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.FillString(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns prefilling value for a specified text. (dynamically)
member.param: Number of filling characters.
Selected text to fill.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Int64,System.Byte,System.String)
member.summary: Returns prefilled text for a specified number. Add //TODO:
member.param: Number of filling.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Selected text to fill before number.
member.returns: A number prefilled by selected text with maximum digit set.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Int64,System.Byte,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns prefilled text for a specified number.
member.param: Number of filling.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Selected text to fill before number.
member.returns: A number prefilled by selected text with maximum digit set.

member.returns: Concentration of prefill string and number itself.
